Module hu.unipannon.virt.plot
Package hu.unipannon.virt.plot.fluent

Class Defaults

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.unipannon.virt.plot.fluent.Defaults
  • public class Defaults
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains default values for the controllers. Each value is represented with a public static field.
    Author:
    Tóth Bálint
